nodes.text: The Melus system was a star system that was located in the Nicandra sector, within the Mid Rim and New Territories regions of the galaxy. The system was the namesake of the Melusi Uprising, a conflict which the Judicial Forces of the Galactic Republic ended around 900 BBY.
The Melus system was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which placed the system in grid square L-7.
